name: ercl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c1))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c2)), wrel(c2), wbr(c0, c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wrel(c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c2, c3))
-| wi(wa(wrel(c2), wbr(c0, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c1))
-| wi(w0, wrel(c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c2, c3))
-| wi(wa(wrel(c2), wbr(c0, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrel(c2))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))
-| wi(wer(c2, c1), wrel(c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c2, c3))
-| wi(wa(wrel(c2), wbr(c0, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))
-| wi(wer(c2, c1), wrel(c2))

|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c2, c3))
-| wi(wa(wrel(c2), wbr(c0, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wrel(c2), wbr(c0, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c1))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))
-| wi(wer(c2, c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))
-| wi(wer(c2, c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c1))

|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))

comment: Elementhood in the field of an equivalence relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
